attributes.action: force the use of renewable energy systems in powering mobile phone basestations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish the Government to make it compulsory for telecoms companies to use renewable energy systems to power (in part or full) their mobile base stations.  This is already planned by the GSM Assoiation in 3rd world countries, so why not here in the UK & Europe?
